author: cezar
msg: Contributed by Dimitry Gerasimenko. Fix permgen memory bug, if XMLBeans is used in a classloader other than the system classloader (like in a servlet container), after there are no user refences to XMLBeans, the garbage collector can unload XMLBeans classes...Pratial port from v2, fix for JIRA bug XMLBEANS-148
